---
title: Performance Visualizations for the `bbob-largescale` test suite 
---

Below, we provide postprocessed data showing the performance of [all currently available algorithm data sets](../../../../testsuites/bbob-largescale/data-archive.html) for the `bbob-boxed` test suite.


## Performance Comparison

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

import re
import sys
sys.path.insert(1, '../../scripts/')
from IPython.display import Markdown

import cocopp

dd = cocopp.archiving.get('bbob-largescale')
display(Markdown("\n- [all](https://numbbo.github.io/ppdata-archive/bbob-largescale/all/index.html):"))
for ddd in dd:
	display(Markdown(re.findall(r'/.*_', ddd)[0][1:-1] + ", "))

```



## Example code to produce the figures

The Python code to locally generate the above linked data reads

```python
import cocopp                     # see https://pypi.org/project/cocopp
cocopp.main('bbob-largescale/*')  # will take several minutes to process

```
